nodes.text: Allaya Djo was the daughter of Augwynne Djo, mother of Teneniel Djo, and grandmother of Tenel Ka Djo. She was the warmaster of the Singing Mountain Clan until her untimely death in the desert.

This name was given to the unnamed mother of Teneniel by The Essential Guide to Characters and was picked up by Star Wars Encyclopedia. It's possible that this person may also be the same person as Kara'Teel, the youngest daughter of Augwynne named in Cracken's Threat Dossier.
